forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.
